phrs.translation: 不注意地, 漫不经心地

sentences.sentence: I sketched inattentively along the margins of my homework.
sentences.translation: 我一时大意，在我的家庭作业的空白处画起速写来。

sentences.sentence: The building west month lo wears me, tiny lower the head, inattentively hang up a corner of jaws, "whether have what medicine, later eating ambition forget some human, some matters?"
sentences.translation: 楼西月瞧着我，微微低头，不在意地勾勾嘴角，“是不是有什么药，吃了之后会忘掉一些人，一些事？”
